name: Downyflake
description:
Following a day hike in Downyflake State Park's recreational hiking area, you find yourself at the overlook realizing it's past closing hours! How did you lose track of so much time? Is the gate locked? Are the park rangers searching for you? 

Descending the trail you find something unexpected... You must play the game to open the gate. What will you find in Downyflake after hours? And what might find you? 

Controls: 

W - Move Forward

A - Move Left

S - Move Backward

D - Move Right

Shift - Hold to Run

ctrl - Hold to Crouch

Space Bar - Jump

Mouse - Look

Left Mouse-Click - Interact

Based on David Wehle's Game Dev Unlocked / 7-Day Game Launch Challenge course

Special thanks to Desert Skies Podcast for podcast audio. https://desertskiespodcast.com/ Support it, it's great!

Music by Bert Cole https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/, https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/8-bit-music-booster-pack

Additional credits for Freesound.org sfx assets will be added shortly

Note for Mac users - You may need to update your settings to run the app. See https://macpaw.com/how-to/unidentified-developer-mac#:~:text=Here%E2%80%99s%20ho...

Thanks for playing! Please provide feedback!

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ebbenflows
